name: Monster Java
description:
This game was made for a 10-day game jam hosted by a 3D Game Development course at Arizona State University.  This game is just a prototype -- it is not fully developed and does contain bugs. Any and all feedback is welcome!

Play as a barista serving hot coffee and drinks to your monster customers. Sell enough drinks by the end of the week to win the game!

Game created by Aidan Fyfe, Tina Truong, Summer Gautier, Hannah Dobos, and Joseph Fabian.

Controls:

WASD to move, mouse to look around.

Space to pick up/put down coffee cup. 

Stand next to espresso, tea, and mocha machines to fill your coffee cup before serving.

Place on counter to serve.

Art inspo for monsters created by Aidan Fyfe and Tina Truong!
